measurements_data.comments: 2 (Havana, 0.7 kg/person/day; rural, 0.5 kg/person/day); excludes bulky, industrial, and medical waste; likely also excludes commercial waste, but this cannot be confirmed

measurements_data.comments: OD: Calculated based on remainder of waste that was collected but not recycled or put in CLF in Havana; CLF: Calculated based on estimate of total waste received at unengineered landfills in Havana Province only divided by MSW generated nationwide; no information available on landfils outside of Havana; MSW generation estimates do not include bulky waste, industrial, or medical waste; also likely does not include commercial, but this cannot be confirmed; RE: Calculated based on estimates of waste recycled or composted compared to total generation; UA: Calculated based on waste produced by population without collection service, primarily in rural areas
